job.title: Frontend Software Engineer ( Remote ) ( Full-Time )
job.description: <p><strong>Staff Frontend Software Engineer ( Remote ) ( Full-Time )</strong></p><p><strong>Location: Remote</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Must Haves:</strong></p><ul><li>You have 5+ years of professional work experience.</li><li>You have experience with CSS in large-scale web app development.&nbsp;</li><li>You have hands-on experience utilizing React.</li><li>You love the good parts of JavaScript and have an intimate relationship with the weird parts.</li><li>Big Data experience would be considered a big plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Roles and Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Use front-end technologies like ES6, React, and Redux to build modern, scalable web applications.&nbsp;</li><li>Dive deep and solve challenging problems in both technical and cultural areas of working at a startup.&nbsp;</li><li>Write functional and integration tests to ensure reliability across releases.&nbsp;</li><li>Collaborate with multi-functional teams, working with other specialists to break down complex ideas and drive features from start to finish.&nbsp;</li><li>Drive technical investments from the early exploration of ideas to delivering integral parts of our stack, balancing short-term goals with long-term architectural vision.&nbsp;</li><li>Mentor others on your team to help them grow as engineers across many dimensions.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span>Basic Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science or related discipline.&nbsp;</li><li>You have 5+ years of professional work experience.</li><li>You have experience with CSS in large-scale web app development.&nbsp;</li><li>You have hands-on experience utilizing React.</li><li>You love the good parts of JavaScript and have an intimate relationship with the weird parts.</li><li>You are a mindful, empathetic, and communicative teammate.&nbsp;</li><li>You take pride in the things you build, from the visual polish of the user experience to the reliability of services.&nbsp;</li><li>You believe in and thrive in test-driven development.&nbsp;</li><li>You understand that being an effective software engineer is as much about communicating with people and understanding the problem to be solved as it is about writing code.&nbsp;</li><li>You're interested in observing existing development patterns, identifying their strengths and weaknesses, and designing flexible and maintainable solutions to augment those patterns. You are a lifelong learner.</li></ul><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Hands-on experience working within large data platforms.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Technologies you will be exposed to:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>React&nbsp;</li><li>Redux&nbsp;</li><li>NodeJS&nbsp;</li><li>CSS&nbsp;</li><li>Python&nbsp;</li><li>Docker&nbsp;</li><li>AWS&nbsp;</li><li>Cypress</li></ul><p></p>
